content: round 1 in white ch3 counts as first double_crochet 11dc into a magic_ring join to 3rd st in ch3 with slip_stitch pull yarn tail tight 12st round 2 ch3 *2dc into the same st* join to 3rd st in ch3 with slip_stitch 24st the christmas coaster round 3 ch3 *2dc into the same st 1dc into next st* join to 3rd st in ch3 with slip_stitch 36st round 4 ch3 *2dc into the same st 1dc into the next st 1dc into next st* join to 3rd st in ch3 with slip_stitch cut and bind off white yarn 48st round 5 join green yarn where white yarn was removed ch5 counts as first double_crochet and ch2 space skip one st *1dc into the next st chain 2 skip one st* until end of round join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain in ch5 24dcs and 24 spaces round 5 ch1 *3 single_crochet between each double_crochet from previous row* join to first single_crochet with slip_stitch 72 scs round 6 ch1 single_crochet in same st *skip 2st 5dc in next st skip 2st single_crochet* 17 times on 18th and final repeat do not do the final single_crochet join to first single_crochet with a slip_stitch cut and bind off green yarn materials weave in all ends then i advise blocking or ironing take some ribbon some chunky yarn or plait some yarn together and weave it in and out of the gaps tying it off in a bow - fingering/4 ply yarn in red green and white used here scheepjes catona a pattern i put together as an easily mailable christmas gift the first i ve ever - 2 75mm crochet hook written it can be crocheted in an hour or so and doesn t use much of each ball of yarn you can get at least 4 coasters out of 50g balls of each colour -
